short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Download search results of Meta Ad Library as an Excel file

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Download all data displayed in search results of Facebook Ad Library as an Excel file.

- Click the extension's icon
- Enter a query
- The extension starts recoding data after a NEW query is executed, that is after a navigation
- Click the colorful button to download an excel file with all the data of the displayed ads

The extension is free and open source.
